ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 283
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If thats the case perhapse the Tattered Mantle that commonly drops from Gullerback in the Burning woods is a posibility.  Gullerback is a gorilla that can
ygData.messageBody:
>2. Also, when I was recently shopping at one of the merchants in the
>Library, I saw this item. (see attachment). Mantles can also be
>considered cloaks...

If thats the case perhapse the Tattered Mantle that commonly drops from
Gullerback in the Burning woods is a posibility. Gullerback is a gorilla
that can range from 46th to 52st level. At 51 and 52 he can summon and he
does hit quite hard. Decent group of 50s can take him expecially if
reverse kiting is used.

The Mantles that are droped are kinda wuss gear for the level of Gullerback
but maybe they can be used in the making of the thermal cloak. Just
something to try.


Lomack, Elder of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
